comment.author: 26269813@N00
comment._content: Is it of a portrait painted by Sir Henry Raeburn, ca. 1820s?

comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: Loose painting copy portrait of Sir Walter Scott's famous portrait by Sir Henry Raeburn 1822 - oft copied - Could be illustration study used for this book found on Library of Congress site - Illustration here: images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.loc.gov/exhibi... Sir Walter Scott, after Sir Henry Raeburn. Detroit: Detroit Publishing Co., ca. [1900-1920]. Copyprint.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for making this connection. We'll add a note.
